error-description: There’s no proof of existence for this record. It might have been modified unintentionally.
first-source: - The issuer provided an altered version of the record.
second-source: - The record was altered by a malicious third party during transmission.
fourth-source: - You were provided a fraudulent proof by the issuer.
fifth-source: - Your record is still pending to be transacted into a blockchain protocol by the issuer.
try-again: Please try loading your record again in a few minutes.
